inlineContent.text: Run the preview and tap to select the tabs at the bottom of the screen: Gallery, Quiz, and Drawing.

tasks.title: Create a new project and add GalleryView

inlineContent.text: Create and configure an Xcode project. You can change all the emoji flags. While you walk through this sample.
Creating a new project using the iOS App template.
Enter “Oh My Flag” as the Product Name.

creating-01-02.png.alt: A `screenshot` of the project sheet, which shows the Product Name for the app being built as Slothy. The Interface is set to SwiftUI, and the Life Cycle is set to SwiftUI App.

doc://MyLibrary/tutorials/MyLibrary.title: Exploring SwiftUI App: Oh My Flag

abstract.text: Explore the SwiftUI App using Swift Playgrounds on iPad or in Xcode. In this walkthrough, you’ll learn the composition of Oh My Flag app. Enjoy it!

creating-01-01.png.alt: A screenshot of the template selector in Xcode. In the top row, iOS is selected as the platform. In the Application section, App is selected as the template; there's a highlight placed over the Next button at the lower-right of the sheet.

01-creating-section1.PNG.alt: An arrow pointing from the GalleryView framework icon to the Xcode app project icon.

creating-intro.png.alt: A wireframe of an app interafce that has an outline of a sloth and four buttons below the sloth. The buttons display the following symbols, from left to right: ice, fire, wind, and lightning.
